system.requirements: Reach 2,500xp Spent (or any multiple of 2,500). Optional, can choose to stick with current specialty and gain +5 to any one Characteristic character has an Aptitude in.
system.descriptionText: The Scout desires to be at one with their environment, to move unseen and to lead the way for those behind them through hostile or arduous terrain. As little as a twitch of a leaf or abormal silence telling them all they need to know about an oncoming threat.
system.effects:
Replace Current Specialty's Aptitudes and Equipment with that of the Scout. Apt: Agility, Fieldcraft, Strength, Perception, Offence, Weapon Skill
Add. Equipment: 4 Smoke Grenades, Cameleoline Cloak, Magnoculars, Best Mono-Knife. Gain Talents: Sure Strike+Quick Draw or Ambush
Can Purchase Unique Talent: Terrain Expert and Basic Order: Silent Ambush
